   185â†’### Key Views

   187â†’#### 1. Mode Editor
   188â†’- **Visual Controller**: SVG representation of Launch Control XL 3
   189â†’- **Control Properties Panel**: Configure CC, channel, range
   190â†’- **Drag & Drop Mapping**: Visual assignment of controls

   195â†’- **Grid/List View**: Toggle between layouts

   200â†’

   272â†’## ğŸ”Œ API Specifications
   273â†’
   274â†’### REST API Endpoints
   275â†’
   276â†’\```typescript
   277â†’// Authentication
   278â†’POST   /api/auth/login
   279â†’POST   /api/auth/logout
   280â†’GET    /api/auth/session
   281â†’
   282â†’// User Modes
   283â†’GET    /api/modes                 // List user's modes
   284â†’POST   /api/modes                 // Create new mode
   285â†’GET    /api/modes/:id            // Get specific mode
   286â†’PUT    /api/modes/:id            // Update mode
   287â†’DELETE /api/modes/:id            // Delete mode
   288â†’
   289â†’// Catalog
   290â†’GET    /api/catalog               // Browse public modes
   291â†’GET    /api/catalog/:id          // Get public mode details
   292â†’POST   /api/catalog/:id/download // Track download
   293â†’POST   /api/catalog/:id/like     // Like/unlike mode
   294â†’
   295â†’// User Profile
   296â†’GET    /api/users/:id            // Get public profile
   297â†’GET    /api/users/me             // Get current user
   298â†’PUT    /api/users/me             // Update profile
   299â†’\```
   300â†’
